mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LESSON_REVIEW( REVIEW_ID, TEACHER_ID, STUDENT_ID, LESSON_ID, REVIEW, REVIEW_DATE ) SELECT REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{teacherId}, #{studentId}, #{lessonId}, #{review}, sysdate FROM LESSON L INNER JOIN TEACHER T ON L.LOGIN_ID = T.LOGIN_ID WHERE L.LESSON_ID = #{lessonId} AND T.LOGIN_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.select: SELECT STUDENT_ID, TEACHER_ID, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW FROM LESSON_REVIEW where TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
